main_features.description: Scrapes convocatorias from the EU's funding opportunities portal and updates the database with new calls.
Provides a web-based interface to manage and monitor the system using Adminer.
Exposes endpoints for managing tender calls via a REST API, including pagination and filtering.
Displays real-time status of the system, analytics on scraping results, and convocatoria recommendations.

technical_stack.description: Framework for building APIs with Python.
ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) to interact with the database.
Framework used for web scraping tasks.
Database system for storing and retrieving data.

corrective_actions.action: Define the 'Task' model in the 'app/models.py' file or import it from an existing module where it's defined.
